conbody.p: (b)(3)(ii)(C) See MP5301.601-90. Submit determinations through the SCO to SAF/AQC for approval.

See AFFARS 5306.304 (a) for the approving officials for proposed orders or BPAs using the limited or sole source justification at FAR 8.405-6(a)-(c). See the tailorable Limited Sources Justification and Approval (J&A) template. See AFFARS 5306.303-1-90 for “Bridge Actions.”
